00031 class SIM_API cStringParImpl : public cParImpl
00032 {
00033   protected:
00034     // only one of expr and val is active at a time; however, we cannot use
00035     // union here because std::string has constructor/destructor.
00036     // selector: flags & FL_ISEXPR
00037     cExpression *expr;
00038     std::string val;
00039

00041     void copy(const cStringParImpl& other);
